channel.title: 01 编程语言 on Woody's Notes
channel.description: Recent content in 01 编程语言 on Woody's Notes

item.description: 知识点 语言的特点和优势 数据类型及定义 bool, string, number, 流程控制Flow control（循环for, 分支if else and switch; 错误处理defer, panic, recover, Errors） Pointers, Structs, Arrays, Slices, Range, Maps OOP(Methods and Interfaces), Stringers Type Assertions, Type switches Readers Goroutines, Channels, Buffered Channels, Select, sync.Mutex 测试和调试 单元测试 go test MVC框架 编译、调试 go build helloWorld dlv debug 日志输出 错误处理 交叉编译 GOARCH=mips GOOS=linux go build -o test helloworld.
Python命令 ###启动简易Web服务器 python3 -m http.server 8080

Rust Installing rustup curl –proto ‘=https’ –tlsv1.2 -sSf https://sh.rustup.rs | sh Installing rust-src component rustup component add rust-src cargo install xargo rustup toolchain install nightly rustup default stable rustup update rustup target add x86_64-unknown-linux-musl rustup target add mips-unknown-linux-musl rustup target add arm-unknown-linux-musleabi rustup target add x86_64-apple-darwin Installing cross toolschain brew install musl-cross –help –with-arm –with-mips .cargo/config [target.
